name: femaleness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or quality of being female: Each new baby born has an approximately equal probability of inheriting maleness or femaleness. She claimed that maleness was more highly valued than femaleness. See
female
More examplesFewer examplesMany women in the workplace are under pressure to negate their femaleness, and don't feel they can admit to having family reponsibilities. I stared at the powerful femaleness that radiated from her eyes.She was a girl whose femaleness was not immediately apparent.
